basics.name: Robert Wang
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Develope Android app for >5 years (Kotlin and Java) for both in-house/freelance projects. LOVE ❤️developing touchable product to make life easier instead of harder. The hard part is to communicate and I try to be nice. Also happen to be Bullet Journalist, Yogi, Runner, Father of 2 kids.

work.summary: Coordinate with PM and designer to deliver better Android products
highlights: Develop 3 major versions of KYMCO-Noode app with features like social/journey/safety/music
Develop battery-logistics app and vehicle-rental app
Responsible for CI maintenance and use CircleCI also
Develop Android app with features including browsing, sell products and payment integration
Learn the struggles of startup team with limited resources

work.summary: Worked on various home control prototypes.
highlights: Integrating Z-Wave modules with OpenHab running on Raspberry Pi to control different switches.
Implement Android app with VLC & csipsimple inside to receive live-stream from doorbell camera.
Jiepang emerged as red-hot check-in app in China.
Single-handedly deliver an loyalty program app BuddyCard.

work.summary: Work on multiple projects with different skill sets like C#/Web/Android
highlights: Implement experiment tools for manipulating data through web interface
Draft proposal documents for Galileo Competition and won special prize
Implement permission module for App market platform for Netbook PC running Android OS

freelance-project.name: Code4Green
freelance-project.summary: A score-recording app for Golf players
highlights: Cloned functions in iOS app as standalone Android App by myself

freelance-project.name: NewsSpur
freelance-project.summary: A mobile app for witnessing event on site
highlights: Partnered with friends to help delivering Android app for their client

freelance-project.name: Buildant
freelance-project.summary: A tablet app for managing work hour at construction site
highlights: Worked with owners from U.S to deliver a prototype for their client

freelance-project.name: App Generator
freelance-project.summary: A app for bank customer service
highlights: Using C# to generate multiple Android apps for different banks as customer service auto-dialing app

awards.title: Hami Apps Competition Finalist
awards.summary: The app "Expired When" listed as finalist selection from thousands of participants. It lists your groceries as reminder to keep records of expire dates. Hopes to reduce wastes any precious food.

awards.title: TravMate
awards.summary: It enables a foreign tourist to access local socializing networks so that the tourist can interact with local friends and overcome cultural and language barriers and access local services such as dining, accommodation, transportation and recreation, etc.

publications.name: Applying CCNN to Recognizing Patterns in the Time Series of TAIEX Futures
publications.summary: Innovative middle-out compression algorithm that changes the way we store data.

publications.name: 利用G-Sensor及電子羅盤於手機定位之實驗
